issue.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.

`android:editable` is deprecated: Use an `<EditText>` to make it editable

On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up and restored on app install. Consider adding the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
Should explicitly set `android:allowBackup` to `true` or `false` (it's `true` by default, and that can have some security implications for the application's data)
